children.text: Added a gene view that shows credible sets in and around genes, as well as genes that affect or are affected by the input gene by pQTLs
Added datasets: FinnGen/MVP/UKBB meta-analysis, FinnGen Kanta lab values, FinnGen pQTLs
Updated datasets: Open Targets, eQTL Catalogue, FinnGen, FinnGen/UKBB meta-analysis
Added a QTL tissue and cell type summary table in the variant view
Added a download option to the phenotype summary table in the variant view
Added a gene-based search in the variant view that returns results for coding variants in the gene
